gamerule.creeperSwarmBabyCount.descripti: The amount of baby Creepers to spawn when an adult explodes, -1 scales based on the health of the Creeper.
gamerule.creeperSwarmExplosionScale.desc: The multiplier of the explosion size for baby Creepers as a percentage. 25 is 25%.
gamerule.creeperSwarmHardMultiplier.desc: Multiplies the amount of baby Creepers that spawn when the world has Hard difficulty.
gamerule.creeperSwarmSiblingRivalry.desc: Enables baby Creepers from the same parent to damage each other.
gamerule.creeperSwarmSpeedBoost.descript: Gives baby Creepers the baby speed boost.
